#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int arr[100001], store[317][100001];
int main() {
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); 
	int N,U,i,j,k,a,b;
	cin >> N >> U;
	int sqrtN = ceil(sqrt(N));
	//cout << "sqrtN = " << sqrtN << endl;
	
	vector<pair<int, int> > v;
	while (U--) {
		cin >> a >> b;
		if (a >= sqrtN) {
			for(i = b; i <= N; i += a) {
				arr[i]++;
			}
		}
		else {
			store[a][b]++;
		}
	}
	int bucket[sqrtN];
	for(i = 1; i < sqrtN; i++) {
		memset(bucket, 0, sizeof(bucket));
		for(j = 1; j <= N; j++) {
			bucket[j % i] += store[i][j];
			arr[j] += bucket[j % i];
		}
	}
	for (i = 1; i <= N; i++)
		cout << arr[i] << " ";
		//cout << i << "=" << arr[i] << endl;
	return 0;
}
